definition: to follow/to go along with
surname Sui
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: This nature of mind is spontaneously present.
sentences.chinese: 心之本质随顺自然呈现。

emptiness
to pray to Buddha/to chant the names of Buddha
